interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Magnetic Eyelashes with Eyeliner Kit - 8 Pairs Invisible Magnetic False Eyelashes and Black Eyeliner of 2 Tubes Sets, Auchois 3D Reusable Natural Look Fake Eyelashes, Faux Mink Lashes Pack
Review Date: 2021/07/27
Store: AUCHOIS
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'AUCHOIS', 'Material': 'Faux Mink', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '9.2 x 5.7 x 0.78 inches', 'Material Feature': 'Latex Free', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '9.2 x 5.7 x 0.78 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'BME001'}
Review Text: [[VIDEOID:cb9b4f9df532525269b6bd626cc29f60]] I have heard horror stories about people accidentally gluing their eyes shut with eyelash adhesive.  My sister wanted to try some for her wedding and I thought this would be a safer option.  It's as easy as applying eyeliner.  The magnets on the back of the lashes automatically stick to the eyeliner and stay in place until you remove them.  They seem well made and look natural.  The set includes 8 pairs of lashes, a case with a mirror,  the special eyeliner,  and even a pair of tweezers made for eyelashes.
Review Title: So easy to use
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
6 Pieces Bouffant Caps with Buttons, Soft Unisex Stretch Headband Elastic Turban Headwrap with Ear Loop Holder Button (Black, Grey, Lake Blue, Royal Blue, Navy, Purple)
Geyoga
{'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Cotton', 'Fabric Type': 'Elastic', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Brand': 'Geyoga', 'Package Dimensions': '12.24 x 10.2 x 1 inches; 7.05 Ounces'}
I bought these for my son who is on the autism spectrum.  Because of his sensory issues,  he hates the ear loops on his mask that he wears to school.  These are super comfortable and the mask loops can be moved to the side buttons.  I was a little concerned that he would get hot wearing a hat all day, but they are very lightweight and breathable.
Very comfortable

Hair Scrunchies for Girls Hair Ties 7PCS Candy Color Hair Accessories Luminous Hair Scrunchies Bands Soft Elastic Scrunchies Satin Soft Hair Scruchy Natural Glow Only in the Dark Night Hair Accessories for Women and Girls
DOTKV
{'Color': 'Yellow,Orange,Blue,Green,White,Purple', 'Material': 'Satin', 'Item Form': 'Scrunchie', 'Brand': 'DOTKV', 'Hair Type': 'All, normal', 'Package Dimensions': '6.1 x 4.33 x 1.97 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '194852280144'}
I bought these for my daughter who loves cosmic bowling.  I thought these would be great for tying her hair up and would look nice under the blacklight.  They are made out of a fluffy chenille material that is super stretchy.  They look nice in regular light, but really shine under a black light.
Glows under a blacklight
3 Pieces Detangling Hairbrush Unicorn Plastic Massage Comb Paddle Hair Brush Unicorn Hair Detangler Brush for Women Girls Curly Straight Long Thin Soft Natural or Short Hair (Vivid Pattern)
Patelai
{'Brand': 'Patelai', 'Shape': 'Oblong', 'Handle Material': 'Plastic', 'Special Feature': 'Detangling, Long lasting', 'Product Benefits': 'Detangle', 'Package Dimensions': '10.4 x 4.7 x 1.8 inches; 9.59 Ounces'}
I bought these for my daughter who loves unicorns.  She is also on the autism spectrum so she has a lot of sensory problems.  Brushing her hair can be a challenge because she hates when it pulls her hair.  These are a great idea because they are so comfortable.  The plastic bristles massage her scalp and the paddle shape smooths her hair without snagging.  Plus she loves the cool unicorn designs.
Super cute
Weiwey Extra Thick Dry Wipe, 100% Cotton, Unscented Cotton Tissues for Sensitive Skin (1 PACK-80PCS)
weiwey
{'Brand': 'weiwey', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Sheet Count': '80', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Cleansing', 'Material': 'Cotton', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '7.08 x 4.41 x 2.36 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '763347936332'}
I bought these for a friend who does theater.  He has to wear a lot of pancake makeup that is kind of hard to remove.  These are so much better than regular makeup wipes because of the texture and strength.  He can use a dry one first off to wipe away a lot of it then another one with make up remover to clean off the rest.  Afterwards,  he can throw them out instead of trying to wash a dirty washcloth every time.
Good for makeup removal
keystand 2 Pack baby wipes dispenser ,Wipes Case Fits up to 60/120 wipes,Paper towels Wipes Dispenser Baby Wipes Case,Carry-on Baby Wipe holder,Keep Wipe Fresh
keystand
{'Brand': 'Keystand', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Baby', 'Product Benefits': 'Clean', 'Package Dimensions': '10.28 x 6.42 x 3.27 inches; 10.23 Ounces', 'Item model number': '0'}
I bought this for my sister who is having a baby.  Her nursery has a black and white theme which kind of makes me feel like I am inside a domino,  but this fits in great.  A full sized refill pack of diaper wipes fits in it easily so there's no guesswork about how many to put inside.  The silicone lid ensures that it is airtight and the wipes don't dry out.  I mainly bought it for the big container,  but I really like the travel one that it came with too.  It's easy to fill and has a handle little handle for carrying it.
Super cute

profile:
**User Profile Summary**

- **Demographics:** Parent of a child on the autism spectrum.

- **Key Preferences:**
  - Prioritizes comfort and sensory-friendly products.
  - Values lightweight and breathable materials, alongside items designed to alleviate discomfort.
  - Enjoys whimsical and engaging designs that provide sensory enjoyment.
  - Emphasizes durability and quality for long-lasting use.

- **Behavior Patterns:**
  - Actively engages with products that enhance sensory experiences and mitigate challenges linked to sensitivities.
  - Adopts a practical approach, appreciating creative and functional solutions that also delight visually.
  - Remains vigilant about product reliability based on past experiences and seeks safer alternatives to traditional options.

- **Shopping Focus:**
  - Seeks functional, comfort-oriented items that manage sensory sensitivities while incorporating enjoyable features, with a recent inclination towards products that combine aesthetics and practicality.
  - Strong emphasis on selecting durable items designed for longevity, reflecting a desire for practical options that delight.

Recent interactions demonstrate a commitment to finding high-quality, practical solutions suitable for sensitive needs, particularly those that integrate easily into themed environments. The user's latest purchase highlights an evolving interest in functional beauty products that ensure safety, ease of use, and a pleasing visual appeal, reinforcing their established values of comfort, durability, and engaging design elements within everyday applications.
